It\'s so nice to see you again. How have you been?
A very warm welcome to our newest member.\nWe are very pleased you\'ve chosen our app for keeping inventory over your shoes..
Some pointers on how to use this app

The next page gives you an overview of all the shoes in your inventory. 

To add a new shoe to the list, click on the round button with a plus sign near the bottom of the screen. This will open up a form where you can provide details about the shoe. Note that all fields except description are required. 
Clicking on the Save button will navigate you back to the shoe list view if all required fields were filled out. The Cancel, Back or Navigate Up buttons will also take you back to the shoe list view, but without adding the shoe to the list. 

To log out of the app just click on the logout menu item on the toolbar.
